com.jogamp.opengl.impl.x11.glx
Class GLX

java.lang.Object
  com.jogamp.opengl.impl.x11.glx.GLX

public class GLX
extends Object

Provides access to the X11-specific OpenGL vendor extensions. See GLBase for more information.
